projects.name: CoolMiniOrNot Base System Featuring Micro Art Studio
projects.blurb: Beautiful, affordable terrain bases for all your miniatures!

projects.name: Zombicide
projects.blurb: Cooperative Zombie survival game with 71 great miniatures!  Take the role of Survivors versus the undead hordes!

projects.name: Dogs of War
projects.blurb: Dogs of War is a euro-style, soldier placement board game of deception, intrigue and shifting alliances for 3 to 5 players.

projects.name: Arcadia Quest
projects.blurb: Lead your Guild and loot the Monster infested city of Arcadia!  No gamemaster required, so everyone gets to join in the fun!

projects.name: Blood Rage
projects.blurb: A strategic board game with amazing miniatures, where Viking clans pillage and battle in a quest for glory at the end of the world!

projects.name: Zombicide: Season 3
projects.blurb: The world's best zombie boardgame is back with new zombies, new survivors, new mechanics, new weapons, and even PvP rules!

projects.name: Wrath of Kings
projects.blurb: An epic fantasy miniatures war game set in a stunning world. Beautiful miniatures, great art and fast rules!

projects.name: Zombicide: Black Plague
projects.blurb: The ultimate zombie boardgame, reinvented in a medieval fantasy setting! New survivors, new zombies, new equipment, and revamped rules!

profile.name: Zombicide: Black Plague
profile.blurb: The ultimate zombie boardgame, reinvented in a medieval fantasy setting! New survivors, new zombies, new equipment, and revamped rules!

projects.name: Rivet Wars
projects.blurb: A new miniatures RTS inspired boardgame. Walking tanks, crazy artillery and cool characters battle in the trenches!

projects.name: The World of Smog: On Her Majesty's Service
projects.blurb: Delve into the magical steampunk World of Smog, puzzling out its labyrinth of rotating gears to recover the precious Artefacts!

projects.name: Rum & Bones
projects.blurb: Two pirate crews engage in fierce battle for Davy Jones' treasure in this miniatures board game for 2 to 6 players.

projects.name: B-Sieged: Sons of the Abyss
projects.blurb: A cooperative castle defense board game with 70 miniatures, where mighty Heroes have to withstand the siege of an Abyssal horde!

profile.name: B-Sieged: Sons of the Abyss
profile.blurb: A cooperative castle defense board game with 70 miniatures, where mighty Heroes have to withstand the siege of an Abyssal horde!

projects.name: Relic Knights
projects.blurb: A brand new science fiction miniatures game full of over the top anime action!

projects.name: Guilds of Cadwallon
projects.blurb: Quick tactical boardgame set in the City of Thieves! From the legendary Confrontation universe.

projects.name: Zombicide: Season 2
projects.blurb: The follow up to the hit boardgame of 2012! More Zombie action with tons of great miniatures and fast paced rules!

projects.name: Kaosball
projects.blurb: Fast paced fantasy sports game of total domination with 60+ great miniatures! From legendary game designer Eric Lang.

projects.name: Sedition Wars: Battle for Alabaster
projects.blurb: A Deep Space Horror board game with 50 amazing miniatures from Mike McVey!

projects.name: XenoShyft Onslaught
projects.blurb: Defend against waves of horrific aliens in this beautifully illustrated, base defense, deck-building game for 1 to 4 players.

projects.name: Eminent Domain: MICROCOSM + TMG Promos
projects.blurb: Multi-use cards, planets to colonize or conquer, and tech to master—all for 2 players in 10 epic minutes (Includes TMG Promos!)
